creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Millions of people turn to Yelp every day to make spending decisions. Yelp provides a free suite of tools to showcase your business and connect you to the Yelp community. The Yelp for Business Owners app allows you to view important business analytics and connect with customers, including those who have written reviews for your business. This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Minor updates and improvements, making Yelp better for you one release at a time.

This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

The Yelp for Business Owners app allows you to view important business analytics and connect with customers, including those who have written reviews for your business. This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet
◾ Delivery.com

Take advantage of Yelp’s high intent diner audience with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations.
◾ Upgrade and enjoy a smoother FOH with Waitlist, Reservations, Table Management, To-Go, dedicated support, and analytics from Yelp Guest Manager.
◾ Build relationships with a digital guestbook, two-way SMS, and exportable data for marketing campaigns

Beauty & Hair Services - Grow you client book with easy appointment booking online - available with one of our salon scheduler partners
◾ Booksy
◾ Vagaro
◾ Booker

List your business free on Yelp today!

Business not listed on Yelp, yet? No problem! start a business page for free now, visit: https://www.biz.yelp.com/signup

NOTE: This app is for owners and managers to claim their Yelp Business Page. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android
descriptionShort: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Millions of people turn to Yelp every day to make spending decisions. Yelp provides a free suite of tools to showcase your business and connect you to the Yelp community. The Yelp for Business Owners app allows you to view important business analytics and connect with customers, including those who have written reviews for your business. This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.

Millions of people turn to Yelp every day to make spending decisions. Yelp provides a free suite of tools to showcase your business and connect you to the Yelp community. The Yelp for Business Owners app allows you to view important business analytics and connect with customers, including those who have written reviews for your business. This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Minor updates and improvements, making Yelp better for you one release at a time.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Millions of people turn to Yelp every day to make spending decisions. Yelp provides a free suite of tools to showcase your business and connect you to the Yelp community. The Yelp for Business Owners app allows you to view important business analytics and connect with customers, including those who have written reviews for your business. This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet
◾ Delivery.com

Take advantage of Yelp’s high intent diner audience with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations.
◾ Upgrade and enjoy a smoother FOH with Waitlist, Reservations, Table Management, To-Go, dedicated support, and analytics from Yelp Guest Manager.
◾ Build relationships with a digital guestbook, two-way SMS, and exportable data for marketing campaigns

Beauty & Hair Services - Grow you client book with easy appointment booking online - available with one of our salon scheduler partners
◾ Booksy
◾ Vagaro
◾ Booker

List your business free on Yelp today!

Business not listed on Yelp, yet? No problem! start a business page for free now, visit: https://www.biz.yelp.com/signup

NOTE: This app is for owners and managers to claim their Yelp Business Page. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android
descriptionShort: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet
◾ Delivery.com

Take advantage of Yelp’s high intent diner audience with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations.
◾ Upgrade and enjoy a smoother FOH with Waitlist, Reservations, Table Management, To-Go, dedicated support, and analytics from Yelp Guest Manager.
◾ Build relationships with a digital guestbook, two-way SMS, and exportable data for marketing campaigns

Beauty & Hair Services - Grow you client book with easy appointment booking online - available with one of our salon scheduler partners
◾ Booksy
◾ Vagaro
◾ Booker

List your business free on Yelp today!

Business not listed on Yelp, yet? No problem! start a business page for free now, visit: https://www.biz.yelp.com/signup

NOTE: This app is for owners and managers to claim their Yelp Business Page. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android
descriptionShort: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet
◾ Delivery.com

Take advantage of Yelp’s high intent diner audience with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations.
◾ Upgrade and enjoy a smoother FOH with Waitlist, Reservations, Table Management, To-Go, dedicated support, and analytics from Yelp Guest Manager.
◾ Build relationships with a digital guestbook, two-way SMS, and exportable data for marketing campaigns

Beauty & Hair Services - Grow you client book with easy appointment booking online - available with one of our salon scheduler partners
◾ Booksy
◾ Vagaro
◾ Booker

List your business free on Yelp today!

Business not listed on Yelp, yet? No problem! start a business page for free now, visit: https://www.biz.yelp.com/signup

NOTE: This app is for owners and managers to claim their Yelp Business Page. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android
descriptionShort: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet

descriptionShort: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.
title: Yelp for Business

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Millions of people turn to Yelp every day to make spending decisions. Yelp provides a free suite of tools to showcase your business and connect you to the Yelp community. The Yelp for Business Owners app allows you to view important business analytics and connect with customers, including those who have written reviews for your business. This app puts the power of Yelp’s tools right in your pocket!

NOTE: This app is for business owners to manage their Yelp business pages. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

Use Yelp for Business Owners to:
• Track visitor engagement and customer leads from your Yelp Business Page.
• Respond to reviews with a private message or public comment.
• Respond to customer inquiries and messages.
• Upload and manage photos for your business.
• View reports on ad clicks from Yelp users (advertisers only)
• Report reviews and messages.

To get started, download the app and sign in with your business user credentials. If you haven’t yet claimed your business on Yelp, go to biz.yelp.com, and follow the steps to find your business and create your business user account.
descriptionShort: Yelp business owners can get analytics and reply to Yelp reviews and messages.

title: Yelp for Business Owners

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet
◾ Delivery.com

Take advantage of Yelp’s high intent diner audience with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations.
◾ Upgrade and enjoy a smoother FOH with Waitlist, Reservations, Table Management, To-Go, dedicated support, and analytics from Yelp Guest Manager.
◾ Build relationships with a digital guestbook, two-way SMS, and exportable data for marketing campaigns

Beauty & Hair Services - Grow you client book with easy appointment booking online - available with one of our salon scheduler partners
◾ Booksy
◾ Vagaro
◾ Booker

List your business free on Yelp today!

Business not listed on Yelp, yet? No problem! start a business page for free now, visit: https://www.biz.yelp.com/signup

NOTE: This app is for owners and managers to claim their Yelp Business Page. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android

title:
Yelp for Business Owners
23.47.0-28234716

creator: Yelp, Inc
descriptionHtml:
Planning to start a business or already have a growing business? Explore one of the top business apps to help you attract more customers!

Claim your free Yelp business listing to get discovered by millions of people ready to buy, visit and hire! Yelp for Business makes online business advertising easy!

Yelp gets 90+ million visitors each month searching for restaurants, home services and other businesses. Marketing on Yelp makes it easy to connect & reach customers, get more new leads or provide customer service more quickly. Upgrade to Yelp Ads for more advertising services, business suite of tools and extra benefits for your Yelp page!

Build trust with customers by updating your Yelp business listing information anytime!
◾ Easily manage your Yelp business account
◾ Add contact information: phone number, address, and website
◾ Update business hours, service area & current offerings
◾ Upload your best photos to make a great first impression

Connect & Reach Customers with Ads!
◾ Set up notifications so you never miss a lead
◾ Receive and reply to customer messages or requests
◾ Get notified and respond when your customers post Yelp reviews
◾ Offer yelp reservations booking to your patrons
◾ Get requests to schedule appointments or quotes
◾ Get free customer support!

Are you a growing business? Reach 3x more customers with Yelp Ads
◾ Easy to use Yelp ads manager marketing app
◾ Create your business ad within minutes & advertise your business on Yelp
◾ Keep it local! Target customers in areas you choose
◾ Track your Yelp Ads results and see how your advertising reaches customers
◾ Business suite of tools to help a growing business
◾ Easily add business as you grow

Restaurant & Food Services - Get more reservations, order requests and food delivery services from our partners
◾ GrubHub
◾ ChowNow
◾ EatStreet
◾ Delivery.com

Take advantage of Yelp’s high intent diner audience with powerful solutions that simplify and streamline restaurant operations.
◾ Upgrade and enjoy a smoother FOH with Waitlist, Reservations, Table Management, To-Go, dedicated support, and analytics from Yelp Guest Manager.
◾ Build relationships with a digital guestbook, two-way SMS, and exportable data for marketing campaigns

Beauty & Hair Services - Grow you client book with easy appointment booking online - available with one of our salon scheduler partners
◾ Booksy
◾ Vagaro
◾ Booker

List your business free on Yelp today!

Business not listed on Yelp, yet? No problem! start a business page for free now, visit: https://www.biz.yelp.com/signup

NOTE: This app is for owners and managers to claim their Yelp Business Page. If you’re looking for the Yelp app that will help you discover great local businesses, go to https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yelp.android
descriptionShort: Manage business listings, respond to reviews on the go & connect with customers.
